# required packages

```{r}
require(ranger)
require(gaston)
require(here)
require(tictoc)
```

# data preparation

```{r}
hdra.org <- read.csv(here("HDRA/HDRA_Data/HDRA_Raw", "HDRA-G6-4-RDP1-RDP2-NIAS.AGCT.csv"))
```

```{r}
hdra <- hdra.org[,-1]
rownames(hdra) <- hdra.org[,1]
```

```{r}
saveRDS(hdra, here("dataHDRAwithPheno2", "HDRA-G6-4-RDP1-RDP2-NIAS.AGCT-002.rds"))
```

```{r}
tic()
hdra2 <- readRDS(here("dataHDRAwithPheno2", "HDRA-G6-4-RDP1-RDP2-NIAS.AGCT-002.rds"))
toc()
```
